text: z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Primary school – NHS primary health care facility – Community centre |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|Marsh Wall| |Area [ha]|4.14| |Ward|Blackwall and Cubitt Town| |PTAL [2031]|3-4| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality (small part of the site) z Skyline of Strategic Importance z Flood risk area z Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (Millwall and West India Docks, adjacent to the site) z Tower Hamlets Activity Area z Neighbourhood Planning Area (Isle of Dogs) z Tall Building Zone (Millwall Outer Dock) z Conservation Area (Coldharbour, adjacent to site) z Archaeological Priority Area (Isle of Dogs, tier 3)| |Relevant Permissions|PA/16/02808 – Redevelopment of the site to provide a building of ground plus 48 storey (maximum height 163.08m) comprising 332 residential units; 810 square metres of community floorspace; 79 square metres of flexible retail/ restaurant/community.|
